title: Sunset Yoga Sessions
description: Join us for a peaceful yoga session as the sun sets over the horizon. Our expert instructor will guide you through relaxing poses, perfect for all skill levels.
imageAlt: Yoga instructor leading a sunset session on the beach

title: Swimming Pool
description: Take a dip in our luxurious swimming pool, perfect for a refreshing swim or a relaxing lounge by the water. Poolside drinks and snacks are available.
imageAlt: Guests relaxing by a beautiful swimming pool under the sun

title: Dolphin Show
description: Experience the joy of watching dolphins perform incredible tricks. This family-friendly event will leave you in awe as our dolphins showcase their skills.
imageAlt: A dolphin performing a jump during a show

title: Private Beach Access
description: Relax and unwind at our exclusive beach. Enjoy crystal clear waters, soft sands, and the perfect spot for sunbathing or a refreshing swim.
imageAlt: Guests lounging on a private beach with crystal clear water

title: Karaoke Night
description: Show off your singing skills at our lively Karaoke Night. Choose from an extensive list of songs and enjoy a fun evening with fellow guests.
imageAlt: Guests enjoying a night of karaoke with a microphone and stage
